eventDecorators.name: NewAdjusterCoefficient
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when adjuster coefficient is changed by admin.

eventDecorators.name: NewAdmin
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when new admin is set.

eventDecorators.name: NewBaseRate
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when base rate is changed by admin.

eventDecorators.name: NewInterestParams
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when new baserateperblock is set.

eventDecorators.name: NewPriceOracle
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when new PriceOracle is set.

eventDecorators.name: NewUpdateFrequency
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when update frequency is changed by admin.

functionDecorators.name: BlocksPerYear
functionDecorators.description: The approximate number of blocks per year that is assumed by the interest rate model.

functionDecorators.name: _setAdjusterCoefficient
functionDecorators.description: Sets the adjuster coefficient for Note. Admin function to set per-market adjuster coefficient.

parameterDecorators.name: newAdjusterCoefficient
parameterDecorators.description: The new adjuster coefficient, scaled by 1e18.

functionDecorators.name: _setBaseRatePerYear
functionDecorators.description: Sets the base interest rate for Note. Admin function to set per-market base interest rate.

parameterDecorators.name: newBaseRateMantissa
parameterDecorators.description: The new base interest rate, scaled by 1e18.

functionDecorators.name: _setUpdateFrequency
functionDecorators.description: Sets the update frequency for Note's interest rate. Admin function to set the update frequency.

parameterDecorators.name: newUpdateFrequency
parameterDecorators.description: The new update frequency, in blocks.

functionDecorators.name: adjusterCoefficient
functionDecorators.description: The level of aggressiveness to adjust interest rate according to twap's deviation from the peg.

functionDecorators.name: baseRatePerBlock
functionDecorators.description: baseRatePerBlock The per block interest rate, as a mantissa (scaled by 1e18).

functionDecorators.name: baseRatePerYear
functionDecorators.description: baseRatePerYear The per year interest rate, as a mantissa (scaled by 1e18).

functionDecorators.name: getBorrowRate
functionDecorators.description: Calculates the current borrow interest rate per block.

parameterDecorators.name: cash
parameterDecorators.description: The total amount of cash the market has.

parameterDecorators.name: borrows
parameterDecorators.description: The total amount of borrows the market has outstanding.

parameterDecorators.name: reserves
parameterDecorators.description: The total amount of reserves the market has.

returnDecorators.description: The borrow rate per block (as a percentage, and scaled by 1e18).

functionDecorators.name: getSupplyRate
functionDecorators.description: Calculates the current supply rate per block, which is the same as the borrow rateThe following parameters are irrelevent for calculating Note's interest rate. They are passed in to align with the standard function definition `getSupplyRate` in InterestRateModel.

returnDecorators.description: Note's supply rate percentage per block as a mantissa (scaled by 1e18).

functionDecorators.name: isInterestRateModel
functionDecorators.description: Indicator that this is an InterestRateModel contract (for inspection).

functionDecorators.name: lastUpdateBlock
functionDecorators.description: The variable to keep track of the last update on Note's interest rate, initialized at the current block number.

functionDecorators.name: updateBaseRate
functionDecorators.description: Updates the Note's base rate per year at a given interval (Update Frequency)This interest rate is calculated as follows f(x) = max(0, (1 - $NOTE) * adjusterCoefficient + priorInterestRate ) If Note is trading above 1$ then lower the interest rate to benefit suppliers This function is called in accrue Interest by the cNote Contract.

functionDecorators.name: updateFrequency
functionDecorators.description: The frequency of updating Note's base rate.
